name: biographic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to the events of a person's life or to biography (= writing that tells the story of another person's life): The play includes many biographic details of the singer's life. The book is an epic biographic tale of three women against a backdrop of war and revolution. Related word
biographySynonym
biographical
More examplesFewer examplesThe website displays biographic information on senior executives. The authors present these women's stories in a new biographic dictionary.This biographic series traces the musician's accomplishments over 50 years in great detail.Applicants must supply biometric and biographic data which will be checked against watch lists of suspected terrorists and convicted criminals.
